links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Gerik R. Schjelderup''' ([[27 November|November 27]], [[1899]] - [[1985]]) was a Norwegian actor, painter, playwright and translator. In the [[1956]] adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'', he played the part of [[Gollum]] and several [[orcs]].
